                                 int page)
        Send a player a formatted list of a specified player's messages
        Parameters:
        owner - : The inbox of the player to view
        viewer - : The player viewing the messages
        admin - : True if admin is viewing, false if not
        page - : The page # to view

        Parameters:
        owner - : The contacts who's contacts will be viewed
        viewer - : The player viewing the contacts
        admin - : True if admin is viewing, false if not
        page - : The page # to view

      • clear

        public static void clear(java.util.UUID player,
                         int messageNumber,
                         boolean all)
        Delete a message
        Parameters:
        player - : The player whose inbox the message belongs to
        messageNumber - : The number of the message to delete
        all - : If all messages should be cleared. If true, messageNumber is ignored
